title: Study on the Influence and Mechanism of Resveratrol on Cognitive Impairment in Chronic Kidney Disease Rats Through Regulating Gut Microbiota and the TLR4/NFκB Pathway.
abstract: To investigate the mechanism by which resveratrol (Res) ameliorates cognitive impairment (CI) in chronic kidney disease (CKD) rats through modulation of gut microbiota and suppression of inflammation.
